More than one-third of the 2022-23 season will be complete following Saturday’s slate, with offense, comebacks and resurgence by teams that missed the 2022 #StanleyCup Playoffs defining the first 65 days.

Follow along on today’s action through #NHLStats: https://t.co/O0pO3gwmnE https://t.co/YD3vsTM515

We could give you some creative copy about the Saturday slate, but we'll keep it simple: the @NYIslanders will be wearing the Fisherman logo for the first time since April 12, 1997. #NHLStats https://t.co/msaPrcxE6V

The @NHLBruins and @penguins have met in two previous regular-season neutral-site games:

📍 Omni Coliseum on Feb. 8, 1993
📍 Richfield Coliseum on April 3, 1994

More #NHLStats ahead of the 2023 #WinterClassic: https://t.co/jvq2DQebsJ https://t.co/MrYFYS1CPq

NHL Morning Skate – Dec. 10, 2022

▪️ @NHLJets’ Morrissey reaches 30-point mark
▪️ @ovi8 scores 500th career even-strength goal
▪️ @Senators, @PredsNHL set to open Saturday’s slate

#NHLStats: https://t.co/joR2xpBuMj https://t.co/Z9OUDkAaHz

Jonathan Marchessault scored his seventh overtime goal and tied Shea Theodore for the most in franchise history as the @GoldenKnights defeated the Flyers at T-Mobile Arena.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uWfJS https://t.co/AVMDtv72BV

Lawson Crouse scored twice, including in the final 14 seconds of regulation, to lift the @ArizonaCoyotes to victory. He has now found the back of the net in four of the club's five contests at Mullett Arena (5-1—6).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uWfJS https://t.co/n1Z2rfXsuG

Josh Morrissey had two assists to reach the 30-point mark and help the Central Division-leading @NHLJets improve to 7-1-0 in their last eight games. ✈️

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uWfJS https://t.co/AxmBMxl9y0

Tristan Jarry made 28 saves to defeat the Sabres and earn a point in his 10th consecutive appearance (8-0-2) – the longest active run in the NHL this season.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uWfJS https://t.co/EzBJ0Srv5c

RT @AnaheimDucks: The brothers Megna 🧡

This is their first time playing against each other in the NHL. 

🤝 @SanJoseSharks 

@Jayson_Megna…

Connor McDavid's Friday so far:
▪️ A career-high 7-game goal streak
▪️ Halfway to 50 goals in 2022-23
▪️ On pace for a 73-goal campaign

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uVHUk https://t.co/BnpUDW94R1

Jeff Carter scored his 16th career overtime goal to help the @penguins earn a comeback win. Only three active players have more: Alex Ovechkin (25), Sidney Crosby (19) and Brad Marchand (17).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uWfJS https://t.co/6zlszGw7Hp

Alex Ovechkin scored his 796th career goal and reached another rare NHL milestone on his “Road to 800.”

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uWfJS #Gr800 https://t.co/hFCqkLgCPW

Alex Ovechkin had 51 career empty-net goals entering play but scored another to boost his total to 52, second only to Wayne Gretzky (56) for the most in NHL history.

Read more about @ovi8 in our #NHLStats Pack: https://t.co/w1xZU7TlLp https://t.co/y59gKMRTnZ

On Tuesday we had competing point streaks of 18+ games for the first time in NHL history.

Tonight, we have competing goal streaks of 6+ games for the first time in nearly 40 years (and 4th time in the NHL’s modern era).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uVHUk https://t.co/OyDQcU0yR2
RT @NHLPlayerSafety: Toronto’s Pierre Engvall has been suspended for one game for High-sticking Los Angeles’ Sean Durzi. https://t.co/HTgme…

Alex Ovechkin continues his "Road to 800" tonight as the @Capitals host the Kraken. Ovechkin, who scored a pair of empty-net goals in his last contest, is now within five of the milestone.

How many empty netters has @ovi8 scored in his career? #NHLStats: https://t.co/w1xZU8aoNp

A 10-game Friday will see three of the NHL’s hottest point producers back in action: Tage Thompson, Connor McDavid and Kirill Kaprizov. Our #NHLStats: Live Updates will ensure you don't miss a beat – https://t.co/mAxj5uVHUk https://t.co/jzETPKHVpS

The 2023 #WinterClassic is set to feature three 1,000-point scorers in @penguins teammates Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin as well as @NHLBruins captain Patrice Bergeron.

More outdoor game #NHLStats: https://t.co/jvq2DQebsJ https://t.co/BHlgXihB6U

Two of the NHL’s hottest point producers are back in action Friday as Tage Thompson and Connor McDavid take to the ice during a 10-game slate.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/cEGPCfa5Kq https://t.co/c8kNNYRZ4x

NHL Morning Skate – Dec. 9, 2022

◾ @Marner93, @MapleLeafs keep rolling in front of @justinbieber and Co.
◾ @TBLightning, @DallasStars withstand multi-goal rallies on home ice
◾ Point producers back on display on 10-game Friday

#NHLStats: https://t.co/cEGPCfa5Kq https://t.co/dNqO02oFFF

Mitch Marner of the @MapleLeafs extended his NHL-best point streak to 21 games while Mark Scheifele became the third @NHLJets / Thrashers skater to record 600 points with the franchise on a five-game Thursday.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/1TlqbbzWuA https://t.co/0qtIrRcVGG
RT @NHL: It's Tyler Seguin (@tseguinofficial) with the @Energizer OT winner for the @DallasStars! 🌟 https://t.co/Vmj27DBfdb

RT @NHLJets: A night to remember for Scheif 🤩 

He’s only the third to tally 600 points with our franchise 📈 https://t.co/8kavspkWyu

Hey @justinbieber, did you know the @MapleLeafs are three games shy of the longest point streak in franchise history?

That and more #NHLStats can be found here: https://t.co/1TlqbbiTsA https://t.co/23AeJJezBf

Brian Elliott has his longest winning streak in five years and the @TBLightning have wins in 9 of their past 12 games overall.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/1TlqbbilD2 https://t.co/AQYddegHJz

Matthew Tkachuk (1-1—2) factored on two of the @FlaPanthers' four second-period goals - their most in a single frame this season. Tkachuk (13-24—37) has the most points among all players on new teams in 2022-23.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/1TlqbbiTsA https://t.co/kXCHYSX2hq

Miro Heiskanen scored twice in a span of 1:48 to mark the fastest two goals by a @DallasStars defenseman in more than 21 years.

He can become the 6th defenseman in franchise history to score a hat trick.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/1TlqbbilD2 https://t.co/lRY3tEc4oq
RT @NHLJets: With the assist on Wheels' goal, MARK SCHEIFELE HAS 600 POINTS IN THE @NHL 🎉 🎉 🎉 https://t.co/gu50SODUmS

RT @NHL: MARNER MAGIC. 🪄

@Marner93 keeps the 21 game point streak alive with this quick clapper. https://t.co/O5BjZXSP5x
RT @NHL: The @MapleLeafs are rolling and @justinbieber is loving it. 😎 https://t.co/KOxNlUnHYZ

The @MapleLeafs scored 3 goals in 66 seconds or less for the 6th time in the past 20 years.

A few minutes later, Mitchell Marner extended his franchise-record point streak to 21 games.

Keep up with all the #NHLStats: https://t.co/1TlqbbilD2 https://t.co/hko1Z4DvQe

Brayden Point scored 1:16 into the contest for the @TBLightning. It marked the fourth time Tampa Bay has scored with the opening 90 seconds of a game this season, tied with Buffalo, Nashville and Vegas for the most among all teams.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/1TlqbbiTsA https://t.co/Sqk0iu45qE
RT @PredsNHL: Proud dad 💛 https://t.co/8J8S6i94cG

Steven Stamkos extended his point streak to 12 games – the longest run of his career since his franchise-record 18-game point streak in 2009-10.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/1TlqbbzWuA https://t.co/8NGtOz1GGz

RT @TBLightning: A leader like no other. A gamer like no other.

Thank you for absolutely everything, Ryan. 💙 https://t.co/iOqOeuyp5I
RT @TBLightning: Sure do miss you around here, Mac. 💙 https://t.co/qlYtZwtYSt

A five-game Thursday features a number of players aiming to extend point streaks, as well as Jason Robertson (23-18—41 in 26 GP) looking to become the first skater to reach 25 goals this season.

For that and more, follow #NHLStats: Live Updates ➡️ https://t.co/1TlqbbilD2 https://t.co/vR5f0RWiXF

Filip Hronek eyes to join elite company should he find the score sheet in his 12th straight road game to start 2022-23. You can catch him and the Red Wings on HULU, ESPN+, SN360.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/teiJgg1DPN https://t.co/sej6xYfbMm
Congratulations to Canadian hockey icon Marie-Philip Poulin on winning the Northern Star Award as Canadian Athlete of the Year. 👏 https://t.co/o0NJy7wi9u

NHL Morning Skate – Dec. 8, 2022

▪️ Thompson matches @BuffaloSabres record with five goals in a game
▪️ @cmcdavid97 hits 50 points, overtakes NHL lead in goals
▪️ Panarin records 600th career assist in @NYRangers win

#NHLStats: https://t.co/WayrZwC6bN https://t.co/ktaY4VYp27

Most 30-goal seasons, NHL history:

17 – Mike Gartner
16 – Alex Ovechkin
15 – Jaromir Jagr
14 – Marcel Dionne, Wayne Gretzky, Gordie Howe

Read more about @ovi8 in our #NHLStats Pack: https://t.co/w1xZU7TlLp https://t.co/u9VGZMWvMr

Elias Pettersson became just the second player in @Canucks history to score the overtime winner in consecutive games (also Dec. 5 vs. MTL), joining Mike Santorelli (Oct. 6 & 8, 2013).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwQNo7z https://t.co/fwqQgH300l

Milestone night for Artemi Panarin who reached 600 NHL points.

Since he entered the NHL in 2015-16, only three players have more points: Connor McDavid (263-486—749), Leon Draisaitl (270-381—651) & Patrick Kane (229-414—643). #NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwR4r9z https://t.co/lwmIn9y9jA
RT @NYRangers: The legend grows, one kick at a time. https://t.co/DXZwtHjwB0

Connor McDavid (2-2—4) recorded his 28th career four-point performance and surpassed Mark Messier (27) for the third most in Oilers history. The only players with more are Wayne Gretzky (158) and Jari Kurri (45).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwQNo7z https://t.co/Gmf8B1SVW2

Connor McDavid scored his 23rd and 24th goals of the season, overtaking Jason Robertson as the frontrunner in the 2022-23 Maurice "Rocket" Richard Trophy race.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwQNo7z https://t.co/t334qxk7jJ

Connor McDavid (22-28—50 in 27 GP) is the first player to the 50-point mark for the fifth time in his career (tied or outright). Only three players in NHL history have done so more: Wayne Gretzky (11x), Gordie Howe (6x) and Mario Lemieux (6x).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwR4r9z https://t.co/emldDknxe3
RT @BuffaloSabres: Couldn’t do it without them apples🚨🍏 https://t.co/KGiKBdbhvR

RT @NHL: Is anyone surprised? 

Connor McDavid (@cmcdavid97) is the first to 50 points! 👏 https://t.co/By7dcaEder

Five goals with 20 minutes still left to play.

Tage Thompson sits one goal shy of becoming the first player since Darryl Sittler (Feb. 7, 1976) to record six goals in a game. #NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwR4r9z https://t.co/HnNN0UEDdR

Kirill Kaprizov now stands alone with the longest goal streak and longest point streak in @mnwild history. He already owned the franchise mark for longest assist streak.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwR4r9z https://t.co/BiOyeoSVOp

That's 🖐️ points for Tage Thompson.

Only one player in @BuffaloSabres history posted more goals in a game than Thompson (4-1—5): Dave Andreychuk (5-1—6) on Feb. 6, 1986. #NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwQMQi1 https://t.co/AWLvJ2hcnx

If you are sitting there thinking, wow, Tage Thompson has had quite the first period. You are right. He has. Four goals, five points and hitting the 20-goal mark.

Many more Thompson notes can be found at #NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwR4r9z https://t.co/4KQjlVVvwh

Tage Thompson became the fourth player in NHL history to score four goals in the first period of a regular-season game, joining Peter Bondra on Feb. 5, 1994, Grant Mulvey on Feb. 3, 1982 and Joe Malone on Feb. 23, 1921.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/Ru8lwQMQi1 https://t.co/6kM5j30dA6

All set for a seven-game Wednesday. Which games are you tuning in for?

Follow along with #NHLStats all night long: https://t.co/Ru8lwQNo7z https://t.co/8yb9mgDliw

Ahead of the @Capitals' contest against the Flyers tonight, let's play some Alex Ovechkin trivia as he continues his "Road to 800."

Who’s the only player in NHL history with more 30-goal seasons than @ovi8? #NHLStats: https://t.co/w1xZU7SNVR

Hometown boy Jack Roslovic is giving back to his community through his foundation #RosiesGearforGoals.

@JRoslovic96’s goal is to make sure financial struggles are not a limiting factor for kids in Ohio who want to play hockey. Find out more: https://t.co/tqm5goUw2v https://t.co/CpKK3063cJ
Start time to @NHLBlackhawks at @BlueJacketsNHL game on Dec. 31 changed to 1 p.m. ET (originally 7 p.m. ET). https://t.co/4e1ZyAYoXg https://t.co/1K73SDKrlV

Doubleheaders on @TVASports and @NHL_on_TNT will begin in different cities but conclude in Las Vegas, while a national telecast on @Sportsnet will have Kirill Kaprizov (12 GP) looking to extend the @NHL's second-longest active point streak. 

#NHLStats: https://t.co/0uynQsxkJk https://t.co/nPNcOTtM82

urls.title: The PHIT Act
urls.description: Take Action & Help SFIA & the Sports & Fitness Industry #PassPHIT

data.text: The @NHL is proud to support the PHIT Act, which would help families cover the costs of youth sports fees and other physical activity expenses. Visit https://t.co/MBgjw2OvAu to learn more about how this legislation can help you save and live healthier. #PassPHIT https://t.co/jLSQmYqd8l

NHL Morning Skate – Dec. 7, 2022

▪️ @Marner93 becomes 7th player in the past 30 years with a 20-game point streak
▪️ @StLouisBlues net 7 goals at UBS Arena 
▪️ @NJDevils become third team to achieve rare NHL mark with 10+ home & road wins

#NHLStats: https://t.co/0uynQsxkJk https://t.co/lT1Eub6OGz

Tuesday's slate was highlighted by the @NJDevils posting a shutout for their 10th home win of 2022-23 and the @StLouisBlues scoring a season-high seven goals in their victory.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFdplQu https://t.co/vIepExqc2d

Cole Caufield and Josh Anderson both scored in a span of seven seconds, marking the @CanadiensMTL franchise's fastest two goals on the road in both the regular season and playoffs.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU https://t.co/Z5JAsMpzLO

Matt Murray recorded 44 saves en route to his first shutout with the @MapleLeafs. Two Toronto goalies recorded more saves in a shutout (since 1955-56): James Reimer (49 on Feb. 4, 2012) & Mike Palmateer (47 on March 12, 1977).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU https://t.co/NpqzYuBGGb

Shane Wright, the fourth overall pick at the 2022 #NHLDraft, scored his first career goal (8 GP). He became the second 18-year-old to tally this season, joining fellow 2022 pick and opponent tonight Juraj Slafkovsky (first overall).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU https://t.co/eli9kSnaV7

RT @SeattleKrakenPR: Shane Wright’s goal is the first of his @NHL career. 

Congrats, Shane! https://t.co/P7XFQhaS3g

RT @CanadiensMTL: 1er but du match et 1er but dans la LNH pour Johnathan Kovacevic!

First goal of the game and first NHL goal for Kovy!

#…

The @NJDevils, who have earned at least a point against all 19 teams they have faced in 2022-23, blanked the Blackhawks and improved to 10-3-1 at home.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFdpTG2 https://t.co/uzV8q0ZNkq

Mark Scheifele (2-0—2) recorded his 150th career multi-point game and joined Blake Wheeler (192x) and Ilya Kovalchuk (155x) as the only other players to hit the mark with the @NHLJets / Thrashers franchise.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU https://t.co/4I95xyEInV

Fill in the blank: Mitchell Marner is _____________.

@Marner93 became the fourth active player to record a point streak of at least 20 games, joining Patrick Kane, Sidney Crosby & Paul Stastny. #NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU https://t.co/Cot1MzSEqM

Filip Hronek 🤝 Paul Coffey

Hronek became the second defenseman in @NHL history and first player in @DetroitRedWings history to notch a point in each of the team's first 11+ road games of a season.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFdplQu https://t.co/AgS6YrxHiG
RT @Senators: The #Sens and alumni John Chabot hosted a First Assist hockey clinic at @CdnTireCtr ahead of tonight’s Indigenous Peoples App…

Sean Durzi became the third @LAKings defenseman in the past 10 years to register a six-game point streak, joining Jake Muzzin (8 GP in 2015-16 & 6 GP in 2017-18; 2x) & Drew Doughty (7 GP in 2016-17).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFdpTG2 https://t.co/zVLlXPQlbn

Jack Hughes (0-1—1) has 30 points in 2022-23 (26 GP). Only two @NJDevils / Rockies / Scouts players have required fewer contests to hit the mark in a season at age 21 or younger: Paul Gardner (21 GP in 1977-78) & Kirk Muller (25 GP in 1986-87).

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU https://t.co/LkskG3sLPm

Most first-period goals:

33 – Vegas
30 – @LAKings
30 – Calgary

#NHLStats: https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU https://t.co/N5HSd76Io4

RT @NHL: JACK 😱

This assist is incredible. https://t.co/rfRWHElYGA

We're already 400 games into the 2022-23 season and what a 400 games it has been. What will tonight bring? 🤔

Follow along with the action on a nine-game Tuesday with #NHLStats: Live Updates ➡️ https://t.co/RMGNFd7KrU? https://t.co/vcMvXGCg90

Mitch Marner will put his franchise-record point streak on the line, but his impact goes beyond the ice.

“You’ve got a big spotlight on you to change people’s lives every day & I think it’s your choice to try to do that.” - @Marner93

His community work: https://t.co/I0nE48iTUL https://t.co/ceRRiRx4Eb

The @MapleLeafs and @DallasStars will square off in the first game in NHL history to feature two opposing players with an active point streak of at least 18 consecutive games. Who comes out on top? #NHLStats 

⏰: 8:30 p.m. ET
📺: HULU, ESPN+, SNO https://t.co/DCiiTGnthn

The League's two longest active point streaks go head-to-head when Mitchell Marner and the @MapleLeafs visit Jason Robertson and the @DallasStars during a nine-game Tuesday.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/3mqHyAqMnd https://t.co/yDNUzJIcJb

NHL Morning Skate – Dec. 6, 2022

▪️ @Canucks earn NHL's first four-goal comeback win of 2022-23
▪️ @GoldenKnights snap Bruins home winning streak
▪️ @Marner93 & @JasonRob1999 set to put point streaks on the line in head-to-head matchup

#NHLStats: https://t.co/3mqHyAqMnd https://t.co/YGqf4R26fX

It was a thrilling start to the week as the @Canucks capped the night off with the first four-goal comeback win of 2022-23.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/aZoET7ZDLf https://t.co/v9qHZmtzON

Another day, another comeback in the NHL.

The @Canucks earned just their third four-goal comeback win in franchise history. The others: Jan. 16, 1973 (vs. TOR) and Oct. 15, 1971 (at CGS). #NHLStats: https://t.co/aZoET7ZDLf https://t.co/RblwWxnaJD

A four-goal comeback and 13 total goals later... Elias Pettersson finally called game for the @Canucks in overtime.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/aZoET7ZDLf https://t.co/uw7twbvRw5

4-0 Montreal.
5-4 Vancouver.
6-5 Montreal.
6-6. 

We're off to overtime here at Rogers Arena. #NHLStats

RT @CanadiensMTL: On n'a pas dit notre dernier mot.

It ain’t over ‘til it’s over.

#GoHabsGo https://t.co/9YVWPFgR9u
RT @NHL: From down 4-0, the @Canucks have clawed aaaall the way back and are now leading 5-4 thanks to Jack Studnicka! 🐋 https://t.co/nj1ci…

Bo Horvat (20 G in 26 GP) joined Jason Robertson (23 G in 25 GP) and Connor McDavid (22 G in 26 GP) as the third player to reach 20 goals this season.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/aZoET7ZDLf https://t.co/3ZA333PURi

RT @Canucks: WE REPEAT!
ILYA MIKHEYEV. https://t.co/zgC7SNyxyE
